EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Follow up to Quotation (1563298076.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Follow up to Quotation (1563298076.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Talia,
I hope all is well. I left a message for you using 663-5602 phone number; however, the voicemail message said that it is Laura. I hope this is conveyed to you. I received the quote our customer service team provided you with and I would like to lend my assistance with ensuring we get everything to you in a timely fashion. Could you give me a call or let me know what number would be best to reach you at so I can gather the details necessary for the delivery. Please let me know. Thank you for this opportunity and I look forward to your response. Have a great day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
